description: A Gear Third technique where Luffy inflates his arms to enormous size and unleashes a rapid barrage of massive punches. The technique combines the size and power of Gear Third with the speed of a Gatling Gun attack.
requirements: Gomu Gomu no Mi Devil Fruit
effects: Delivers multiple extremely powerful punches in rapid succession
Each punch has the mass and force of a giant's attack
Effective against large opponents or for overwhelming attacks
significance: Demonstrates Luffy's advanced post-timeskip abilities in a crossover context, contributing to the combined ultimate attack that defeats Akami alongside Toriko and Goku's techniques.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy unleashes this technique as part of the final combined attack against Akami
